patterns.pattern: You call out "Fire!" and release the mechanism on a ballista.
You call out "Fire!" and release the mechanism on an Arcanian arm thrower.
You call out "Fire!" and release the mechanism on an onager.
The wake caused by the movement .+
A wave crashes over the ship as a massive form emerges from the depths.
The result of the depths disturbed, a great wave crashes against your ship, sending spume showering down over all aboard.
A fearfilled silence weighs heavily upon the waves as something shifts in the dark water.
